messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My favorite kind of guy is someone
that looks good out on the open sea!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Don’t get me wrong, it’s not as if I
don’t like mountain men.But, you know, my most favorite kind of
guy looks great with Pokémon!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Hello again! You’re that Trainer who
looks keen with your Pokémon!
